info.title: Get SEC Filings Data
info.description: Fetches the latest 10-Q and 10-K filings. Prioritizes HTML reports and uses Excel as a fallback. Includes CIK resolution, alias learning, and GitHub persistence.

get.description: Returns 10-Q and 10-K filing URLs for a public company. Resolves aliases and prioritizes HTML report delivery.

parameters.name: company_name
parameters.description: Public company name or ticker (e.g., Apple, AAPL, Meta).

200.description: Matched company metadata and direct links to recent SEC filings.

Matched Company Name.description: Resolved company name from SEC dataset.

CIK.description: Central Index Key (CIK) used to retrieve filings.

10-K Filing.description: Most recent 10-K HTML or Excel report URL.

404.description: Company not found or no recent filings.
